definitions.definition: A small striped fish of species Danio rerio , originally from India but now common as an aquarium fish and as a subject of genetic experiments .
A member of certain species of Percina ( logperch ).
Certain venomous lionfish , of genus Pterois .

main_definition: A small striped fish of species Danio rerio , originally from India but now common as an aquarium fish and as a subject of genetic experiments .
secondary_definitions: A member of certain species of Percina ( logperch ).
Certain venomous lionfish , of genus Pterois .
